meanings.sent1: The scroungy old couch in the corner of the room had seen better days.
meanings.sent2: The alley cat looked scroungy with its unkempt fur and sad eyes.
meanings.sent3: Despite his scroungy appearance, he had a heart of gold and always helped others.
meanings.sent4: The scroungy building stood as a reminder of neglect and decay in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The scroungy beggar's clothes were tattered and stained, drawing sympathetic looks from passersby.
